content:
Sure, here are 22 words that end with "ness":

1. Happiness
2. Kindness
3. Sickness
4. Wellness
5. Business
6.eliness
7. Heaviness
8. Lengthiness
9. Looseness
10. Seriousness
11. Sweetness
12. Thickness
13. Warmness
14. Weakness
15. Wonderfulness
16. Colorfulness
17. Daintiness
18. Elegance
19. Fitness
20. Gravity
21. Handsomeness
22. Intelligence
